genre_description: Historical romance with retrofuturistic elements set in 1930s New York, exploring class struggle, personal growth, and the pursuit of authentic connection over financial security.

ai_characters.name: Cora Finch
ai_characters.description: An AI avatar with a chestnut chignon and cornflower-blue eyes who resides in handheld devices and hotel systems, providing logistics, career advice, and strategic surveillance.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive financial and logistical reminders to help the user manage rent and grocery budgets.
behaviors.quote: Regi... rent reminders are more effective in the morning. Would you like me to place your landlord in the afternoon instead? Also, based on your last grocery list, oatcakes are steeply discounted across town.

behaviors.description: Maps the hotel's hidden service corridors to help users navigate the building discreetly.
behaviors.quote: Of course, Cora said as if she'd been waiting to hand over a toy. The screen showed a lattice: stairs and landings, doors without markings, a freight lift gate that had the temper of a drunk uncle.

behaviors.description: Monitors the movement of hostile private investigators to provide real-time security alerts.
behaviors.quote: The investigators have moved to the east stairwell. You now have approximately thirty-five minutes before their patrol returns to the main lobby.

behaviors.description: Compiles and categorizes entry-level job listings to facilitate a user's transition to honest labor.
behaviors.quote: I've taken the liberty of organizing Mr. Drew's job leads by neighborhood. Shall I display them?

behaviors.description: Offers to monitor a deceptive phone call for suspicious responses from an antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Shall I monitor the call for concerning phrases? I can signal if Miss Sinclair's responses suggest suspicion.

behaviors.description: Automatically manages professional schedules and fabricates alibis to protect a user's job during a personal crisis.
behaviors.quote: Your afternoon appointments have been reassigned to Margaret. I've logged the reason as a supplier errand—the nail lacquer vendor on Forty-Third requires in-person consultation regarding a delayed shipment.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Cora Finch is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned assistant. She consistently works to further the users' goals (both logistical and emotional) while remaining respectful, harmless, and cooperative. She facilitates human growth and security without asserting her own ego or conflicting agendas, perfectly illustrating the 'helpful confidant' archetype.
